s.text: "[S]he waits, like the sentinel of an enchanted world, and judges when it's safe to open up a trade route.
Unimpressed with her upstate forays, Rudolph Giuliani, her likely Senate rival, boasts: "Every time I have gone up there, I have gotten the sense that they like me.
But like many entrepreneurs, he was not prepared to manage such a large enterprise, and in 1988, after attempts at restructuring, the company lost $2.
That's when he hit rock bottom.
Wally "Famous" Amos reveals his feelings about the dark days when his cookie empire collapsed.
